languages.text: "В те редкие дни, когда господин Винтерскейл посещал Эурак-V, по станции разливался туман из теплых оттенков. Нам запрещено было видеться, но я с удовольствием наблюдала за столь редкими цветами в моем доме. Теперь же... его оттенки мрачнеют. Искажаются от боли и горечи. Мы должны помочь, Лорд-капитан! Сохранить ясность душевных красок человека, рядом с которым весь мир становится чуточку светлее".

"On the rare days that Lord Winterscale visited Eurac V, the station was awash in a mist of warm hues. We were forbidden from meeting each other, but I was delighted still to see such rare colours in my home. Now, however... his colours are darkening. Twisting from pain and bitterness. We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."
languages.original_text: "В те редкие дни, когда господин Винтерскейл посещал Эурак-V, по станции разливался туман из теплых оттенков. Нам запрещено было видеться, но я с удовольствием наблюдала за столь редкими цветами в моем доме. Теперь же... его оттенки мрачнеют. Искажаются от боли и горечи. Мы должны помочь, Лорд-капитан! Сохранить ясность душевных красок человека, рядом с которым весь мир становится чуточку светлее".

We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul's colours, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."

languages.text: "An den seltenen Tagen eines Besuchs von Lord Winterzunder auf Eurac V war die Station in einen Nebel warmer Farbtöne getaucht. Wir durften einander nicht begegnen, aber ich war dennoch beglückt, so seltene Farben in meinem Zuhause zu sehen. Nun jedoch ... verdunkeln sich seine Farben. Sind verwirbelt mit Schmerz und Verbitterung. Wir müssen helfen, Lord Captain! Wir müssen die Klarheit seiner Seele retten, denn jemand, dessen Anwesenheit die Welt ein wenig heller macht, hat das verdient."
languages.original_text: "On the rare days that Lord Winterscale visited Eurac V, the station was awash in a mist of warm hues. We were forbidden from meeting each other, but I was delighted still to see such rare colours in my home. Now, however... his colours are darkening. Twisting from pain and bitterness. We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."

Wir müssen die Klarheit seiner Seele retten, denn jemand, dessen Anwesenheit die Welt ein wenig heller macht, hat das verdient."

languages.text: « Les rares jours où le seigneur Winterscale se rendait sur Eurac-V, la station était submergée par une vague de nuances chaleureuses. Nous n'avions pas l'autorisation de nous rencontrer, mais je me réjouissais tout de même de voir des teintes aussi rares chez moi. Malheureusement... ses couleurs s'assombrissent, dénaturées par la souffrance et l'amertume. Nous devons l'aider, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous devons sauver la clarté de son âme, parce qu'il le mérite : sa présence rend le monde légèrement plus lumineux. »
languages.original_text: "On the rare days that Lord Winterscale visited Eurac V, the station was awash in a mist of warm hues. We were forbidden from meeting each other, but I was delighted still to see such rare colours in my home. Now, however... his colours are darkening. Twisting from pain and bitterness. We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."

Nous devons sauver la clarté de son âme, parce qu'il le mérite : sa présence rend le monde légèrement plus lumineux. »

languages.text: “当温特斯凯尔勋爵难得造访欧拉克五号星站时，整座星站都笼罩在温暖的薄雾之中。虽然我无法与他见面，但能在我的故乡看到如此罕见的色彩，我依然非常高兴。可现在……他的色彩正在变得暗淡，在痛苦中不断扭曲。我们必须帮这个忙，舰长大人。我们必须拯救他清澈的灵魂。他的存在可以让这个世界变得更加光明，他值得我们出手相助。”
languages.original_text: "On the rare days that Lord Winterscale visited Eurac V, the station was awash in a mist of warm hues. We were forbidden from meeting each other, but I was delighted still to see such rare colours in my home. Now, however... his colours are darkening. Twisting from pain and bitterness. We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."

traits.locale_text: “当温特斯凯尔勋爵难得造访欧拉克五号星时，整座星站都笼罩在温暖的薄雾之中。虽然我无法与他见面，但能在我的故乡看到如此罕见的色彩，我依然非常高兴。可现在……他的色彩正在变得暗淡，在痛苦中不断扭曲。我们必须帮这个忙，舰长大人。我们必须拯救他清澈的灵魂。他的存在可以让这个世界变得更加光明，他值得我们出手相助。”

languages.text: 「ウィンタースケール卿がユーラック・Vを訪れた稀な日には、ステーションは温かな色彩の霧に包まれました。私たちは互いに会うことは禁じられていましたが、それでも我が家からそのような珍しい色を見られるのは嬉しいものでした。ですが今は…彼の色彩は暗くなっています。痛みと苦しみで歪んでいます。お助けしなければ、ロード・キャプテン！彼の魂の純粋さを守らなければなりません。彼はそこにいるだけで世界を少し明るくさせる、救うに値するお方です」
languages.original_text: "On the rare days that Lord Winterscale visited Eurac V, the station was awash in a mist of warm hues. We were forbidden from meeting each other, but I was delighted still to see such rare colours in my home. Now, however... his colours are darkening. Twisting from pain and bitterness. We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィンタースケール卿が珍しくユーラック・Vを訪れた日、ステーションは暖かな色彩の霧で溢れていました。互いに会うことは禁じられていましたが、家にいてそんな珍しい色を見られるのは嬉しいものでした。ですが今は…彼の色は暗くなっています。痛みと苦しみで歪んでいる。お助けしなければ、ロード・キャプテン！彼の魂の純粋さを取り戻さなければ。そこにいるだけで世界を少し明るくしてくれる、彼は救うに値するお方です」

「ウィンタースケール卿がユーラック・Vを訪れた稀な日には、ステーションは温かな色彩の霧に包まれました。私たちは互いに会うことは禁じられていましたが、それでも我が家からそのような珍しい色を見られるのは嬉しいものでした。ですが今は…彼の色彩は暗くなっています。痛みと苦しみで歪んでいます。お助けしなければ、ロード・キャプテン！彼の魂の純粋さを守らなければなりません。彼はそこにいるだけで世界を少し明るくさせる、救うに値するお方です」

languages.text: «En una de las inusuales visitas del Lord Winterscale a Eurac V, una bruma de tonos cálidos inundó la estación. Nos prohibieron vernos, pero a mí me encantaba ver mi hogar teñido de esos peculiares colores. Ahora, por desgracia, ... se están oscureciendo, retorciéndose de dolor y amargura. ¡Debemos ayudarlo, Lord Capitán! Debemos recuperar la luz de su alma, pues quien ilumina el mundo con su sola presencia merece eso y más».
languages.original_text: "On the rare days that Lord Winterscale visited Eurac V, the station was awash in a mist of warm hues. We were forbidden from meeting each other, but I was delighted still to see such rare colours in my home. Now, however... his colours are darkening. Twisting from pain and bitterness. We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."

Debemos recuperar la luz de su alma, pues quien ilumina el mundo con su sola presencia merece eso y más».

languages.text: "Lord Winterscale'in Eurac V'i ziyaret ettiği nadir günlerde istasyon, sıcak tonlardan oluşan bir sisle kaplanırdı. Birbirimizle görüşmemiz yasak olsa da yuvamda böylesine nadir renkler görmek beni mutlu ediyordu. Lakin şimdi... Renkleri koyulaşıyor. Acı ve burukluktan kararıyor. Ona yardım etmeliyiz Lord Kaptan! Ruhunun duruluğunu korumalıyız zira varlığı dünyayı biraz da olsa aydınlatan biri bu kadarını hak ediyor."
languages.original_text: "On the rare days that Lord Winterscale visited Eurac V, the station was awash in a mist of warm hues. We must help, Lord Captain! We must save the clarity of his soul, for he whose presence makes the world a little brighter deserves no less."
